name: BIPAR - European Federation of Insurance Intermediaries
goal:
In accordance with our bylaws, the objectives of BIPAR are :
1) to exchange information between its members;
2) to examine jointly subjects of general interest;
3) to brief national or international organisations and to represent the industry on such organisations;
4) to intervene with public authorities to defend the interests of the industry;
5) to inform the public of the role of producers of insurance and reinsurance.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: IDD, PRIIPs, MiFID, Solvency II, Mortgage, Pensions, Data protection, Anti-money laundering, IBER, Capital Markets Union, Taxation, Insurance Guarantee Schemes, Insurance Contract law, EIOPA/EBA/ESMA consultations
